00002  * tga.h

00008 #ifndef TGA_H_
00009 #define TGA_H_
00010 
00011 #include <SDL.h>
00012 
00013 #ifdef TARGET_WIN32
00014 #define ulong unsigned long
00015 #define uint unsigned int
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 #define uchar unsigned char
00019 
00020 #define TGA_NONE  0
00021 #define TGA_INDEXED  1
00022 #define TGA_RGB   2
00023 #define TGA_GREYSCALE 3
00024 
00025 typedef struct
00026 {
00027     uchar identsize;           // size of ID field that follows 18 uchar header (usually 0)
00028     uchar colourmaptype;       // type of colour map 0=none, 1=has palette
00029     uchar imagetype;           // type of image 0=none,1=indexed,2=rgb,3=grey,+8=rle packed
00030 
00031     uint colourmapstart;       // first colour map entry in palette
00032     uint colourmaplength;      // number of colours in palette
00033     uchar colourmapbits;       // number of bits per palette entry 15,16,24,32
00034 
00035     uint xstart;               // image x origin
00036     uint ystart;               // image y origin
00037     uint width;                // image width in pixels
00038     uint height;               // image height in pixels
00039     uchar bpp;                // image bits per pixel 8,16,24,32
00040     uchar descriptor;          // image descriptor bits (vh flip bits)
00041 
00042     // pixel data follows header
00043 } TGA_HEADER;
00044 
00045 #undef uchar
00046 
00047 #endif /* TGA_H_ */
